review: It is just what I wanted. It works just greay.
author: Garry Silvestre

review: Traded the apple TV for a fire stick. Should've done it sooner!
author: David Hillers

review: We love it....so easy to use.
author: Donella Cole

review: Still trying to learn how to use the Stick but so far I really like it.
author: Karen A. Chang

review: The Fire Stick is wonderful and easy to set up.  Bought one for a three year old Vizio and bought another for an eight year old Vizio.  Both sticks work beautifully.  Vizio TVs aren't bad either.I bought the Fire Sticks because I like British TV (Amazon has great shows) and Amazon didn't have caption capability with the product I was using.  The Fire Stick allows me to have closed captions for most of the Amazon TV shows and movies.I highly recommend this product
author: Joellen BalfourFry

review: Very convenient and versatile! A little annoying that you get an email confirmation anytime you purchase a free app, but great value otherwise!
author: Jeff Glauser

review: Simply wonderful with easy hook up and use.
author: Denise M. Aikens

review: So far very impressed with it, use it with Prime and you tube and works very well!  Setup was simple.
author: Slim Pickins

review: The fire stick works great has all the features of the full size box except for the voice search, and it's nice not to have any extra boxes sitting around
author: Kevin Sr
